description: '''Ali Shirazinia''' ({{langx|fa|علی شیرازی‌نیا}}), commonly known by his stage name '''Dubfire''', is an [[Iranian American]] [[house music|house]] and [[techno]] [[disc jockey|DJ]] and [[record producer|producer]]. Prior to his solo career, Dubfire made up half of the duo [[Deep Dish (band)|Deep Dish]]. Dubfire's style is noticeably different from that of Deep Dish, consisting of techno rather than [[progressive house]].
